dN/dS Calculator
================

.. image:: https://travis-ci.org/adelq/dnds.svg?branch=master
   :target: https://travis-ci.org/adelq/dnds

Calculate dN/dS ratio precisely (Ka/Ks) using a codon-by-codon counting
method.

Usage
-----

.. code:: python

    >>> dnds(sequence_1, sequence2)
    0.86
